The headlines at the beginning of the film are nearly impossible to read over the equally bright scenes. The plot dragged after the initial approximately 30 minutes. The constant drag of "who's trying to kill her now?" wears extremely thin (& it practically ends up being the viewers first guess!)
The ending is unsatisfying.

Yes they blew up the dog !!! I'm finding on Netflix and Amazon they're just killing animals in their movies I'm sorry but you do not get my vote and I can stop using you at any time so make better choices on what movies you will show .... And not to mention quality Hollywood needs to step it up!!!

reviews.review_title: Intelligent if a little bit sparse on storytelling
reviews.content: This is an interesting story and needed to be fleshed out a bit more in order for the viewing audience to follow the narrative. Give it a chance and you may be pleasantly surprised.

This could be one of the worse movies I have ever wasted my time watching..
Script makes no sense from beginning to end..
Vastly disappoint..
Even the star actors couldn't save this turkey..
Don't watch this .. !

I can't believe actors such as Anne Hathaway, Ben Affleck, Rosie Perez and Willem Dafoe would put their names to this piece of crap.
Could not follow it at all, 2 hours of my life I will never get back.
This is the last thing I wanted to watch today!Horrible screenplay, the story is not friendly. It is my 1st review perhaps on IMDB!!Even the cast feels like a shallow one!!Oh God!

Overall, you will be bored, as there just isn't enough storyline to keep you engaged. It's not difficult to keep up on as the other reviews suggestion; it's just slow and you lose interest. The ending is quite predictable. You have a news woman walking into an arms deal which she has no experience with corrupt politicians. How do you think it'll end. Exactly. I agree....for the talent casted - I expected more.
Unclear, hard to follow...and for God sake, San José has no beaches! Its shame that in these days with such great actors make this embarrasing mistake

reviews.review_title: Loved this film! I don't get all the hate!
reviews.content: This film was captivating from start to finish. You were on the edge of your seat. I feel a lot of people hate on truth based film like this but yet love true crime series... makes no sense. I felt Ben Affleck and Anne Hathaway were in top form here. A taut true to life thriller! A great film give it a chance do not listen to the bad reviews.

reviews.review_title: The randomly blow up a dog!!
reviews.content: Wtf. They randomly blow up a dog. Like you actually see it explode! WTF. Plus it just isn't a very good movie. Disjointed and slow.
I feel like i have dementia or possible brain damage from trying to figure out this script.
This movie makes no sense whatsoever. Its awful. The plot is full of holes and nothing really gets answered.

reviews.review_title: The worst thing I have ever seen
reviews.content: I wonder how this cast accepted this. Great actors in a horrible and confusing movie. Nothing makes sense. Do not waste one second of your time
Don't be deceived, there is nothing he wanted. It's only what SHE wanted. And that's a story.
Very bad, just don't waist your time watching this movie
The real problem of this one ? Over Edited. Couldn't stand it more then 20 minutes.
Great cast but Something is missing...DON'T waste your time!!
I felt like I fell asleep and missed something. Last movie I ever "wanted" to watch.
In the movie Anne Hathaway has her left breast removed at 1:20:34 and suddenly at 1:42:27 she changed and has her right breast removed. How is it possible to make a so stupid mistake ?

reviews.review_title: Big stars, zero depth. Hathaway is atrocious.
reviews.content: Big stars, zero depth. Besides the choppy storyline and horrible dialogue, Anne Hathaway's performance, which was worse than what you would see at a high school play, was the most embarrassing part of the movie. I could go on and on, but I'll just say this: she is smoking in practically every scene and doing her level best to make sure the audience knows she has a cigarette in her hand. The gesticulation when smoking is distracting and incredibly amateur. She talks fast throughout the movie in a desperate attempt to sell the character and with this film she has reached a new level of over-acting. If she was new to the industry, she wouldn't get another acting gig.Netflix needs to stop phoning it in.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to like it, I really did
reviews.content: This was by far the worst show I've ever seen with some of my favorite actors ever.The review written by a bot made more sense than this movie.

This movie makes even the most intelligent person feel stupid. I'm a person that sticks to the end of some of the most boring movies, but this one only.. I made it to about the half way point and it was enough for me. The Bad reviews are all correct.

I never write reviews here, but, I can't believe the script is getting ripped so hard. Halfway through I immediately went to IMDB to find out who wrote the screenplay, and damn, Dee Rees kicked it out of the park.There were some 3rd act issues definitely, not sure why some of those choices were made, but, other than that I loved it.
It ruins films these days. Getting past the guttural spew to figure out the plot takes fortitude.

It was inexplicably torturous to watch this film yet I couldn't give up just to see how much worse a screenplay could be. The film was so meaningless and bad that it's almost impossible to compare it with anything I've watched before. I was horribly decived by the cast. Just warning you, don't start watching it, you'll regret big time.

What a terrible movie! Another epic that tries to prove that more than 1.5% of the population are living the Homosexual lifestyle.  The plot is so dumb and the dialogue is poor, that is when you can understand it. So many scenes are whispering and they didn't bother to get the mic close enough to hear so you end up replaying it extra loud.

reviews.review_title: Not as smart as I thought I was
reviews.content: This movie has some veteran players. Did they read this script prior to signing on? I'm glad others have congregated in my confusion. I felt like a joke had been told, and everyone was laughing at the punchline instead of me, the only one who didn't get it...

I really, really wanted to like this movie. Great stars - Ben Affleck and Anne Hathaway. What's not to like? Well quite a lot actually. A meandering plot that did not make sense for starters. Why would the lead character played by Hathaway decide to take over her ailing fathers drug deal?? No really - why? I kept rewinding and watching parts of this film again in case I had missed something crucial - but nope - hadn't missed a thing! And why in heavens name were the drug dealers so readily accepting of her? Not that I have ever tried to infiltrate a drug dealing cartel - but who knew it was so damn easy?? Apparently the movie is based on a book and the script writers changed the ending. Well I have another suggestion - just erase it. All of it. Please. ( by the way several comments from other reviewers that the Hathaway character's breast cancer scar switches from left to right - it doesn't - she is looking in a mirror).

This movie was atrocious. It seemed to be an anti-Reagan film and then turned into a sympathy for the smuggler film and then a film about Alzheimer's and then back and forth.
The only reason I gave it a 3/10 is because they mentioned the Lake City Ammunition Plant in Missouri. This plant is a US government owned, contractor ran ammunition plant and is the largest manufacturer of .22 based ammo in the world.

Astonishing in as much as it was made. I've created an account to post this...I've seen Indy films with less budget that the lens rental costs of this film that have made more sense. No one knew what was going on, a terrible edit (I'm assuming that there's stuff on the cutting room floor that makes sense of all this stupidity..?! The only thing that's any good is the colour grade. It looked amazing. I have no idea how this made it into the cinema. Total waste of hard-drives, lighting, actors and my time...There's a box below where I'm typing this asking if this review contains spoilers... that's the funniest thing I've read...

reviews.review_title: Confused mess, but good acting by some
reviews.content:
Anne Hathaway is good, but her character spends the entire movie with a confused, forlorn, dazed look on her face. Willem Dafoe is excellent, as usual, despite the unlikeable character. Rosie Perez shows she can play more than a Latina caricature. Ben Affleck? Don't bother.
The plot? What plot? No clue. Half the time you can't even make out the dialogue, let alone comprehend it. All we know is that it sort of has something to do with the Sandinistas and illegal arms supplies in Central America in the early 1980s.
Rees gets credit for not allowing Hathaway to be upstaged by her own lips and megawatt smile.
Find some classier directors Netflix. F*#@ you and your Narcos show too
Glad I didn't see these or I wouldn't have warched it. I liked it, it's kind of confusing but that's ok. Maybe it helped that I watched Memento again yesterday.
This is one of the worst films I have ever seen. Nothing makes sense, the characters are bland and not a thing they do makes sense. The plot has mayor holes or one has to imagine the rest.

reviews.review_title: Yikes. Exceptional cast for a horrible movie.
reviews.content: I kept thing this movie was a slow burn and eventually it would turn around, but it doesn't. Don't waste your time with this one. Even with two exceptional lead actors, the script, editing, score, and production suffers greatly. There was no saving this one. It's just a mess.

reviews.review_title: How did Netflix approved this movie?
reviews.content: I should have checked the ratings on imdb before watching this movie... Please do not waste your time and do not even attempt to watch this!!!!!!!
Cannot find words to describe. Can I give a rating lower than 1?

And that's the problem. Wildly pretentious screenplay, absurdly cryptic dialogue, overwrought scene after overwrought scene. This flick has it all. At least being able to copy the stage direction "Anne Hathaway looks up at the man from a distance, has a moment of recognition, and runs away" about 5 times saved some script assistant some work.
The scenario is confusing..very confusing. You just can't follow...what is happening?
This should be the worst movie ever. It doesn't make any sense.
